amendment.description: To clarify the treatment of certain provisions in conference reports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 623 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 623 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S3663-3664; text: CR S3663-3664) To clarify the treatment of certain provisions in conference reports.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 623 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
